"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_huskar_life_break"										"Life Break"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_huskar_life_break_Description"							"Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing their attack and movement. While leaping, Huskar is gains Black King Bar effect.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel<br><br><b><font color='#ff0000'>Deal %creeps_damage%%% damage to creeps</font></b>"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_huskar_life_break_scepter_description"					"Forces the enemy target to attack Huskar and increases cast range."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_huskar_life_break_Lore"									"No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem"										"Requiem of Souls"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_Description"							"Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed reduced for %requiem_slow_duration% seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of %requiem_slow_duration_max%. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery. <br><br> Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_scepter_description"					"Reduces Requiem of Souls cooldown by %scepter_cd% seconds<br><br>Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_abilitydraft_note"	        			"Requires drafting Necromastery to do damage."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_abilitycastpoint"             	     	"CAST DELAY:"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_requiem_reduction_ms"					"%MOVEMENT REDUCTION:"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_requiem_damage_pct_scepter"             "%SCEPTER DAMAGE ON RETURN:"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_requiem_heal_pct_scepter"				"%SCEPTER HEAL ON RETURN:"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_magic_res"					"%MAGIC RESISTANCE REDUCTION:"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_Lore"									"The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_Note0"									"One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every %requiem_soul_conversion% souls in his possession, for a maximum of 18 lines (23 lines with Scepter)."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_Note1"									"The movement reductions from Requiem of Souls go through spell immunity."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_nevermore_requiem_Note2"									"Fear and movement slow do not apply when if the Requiem was released on death."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_legion_commander_duel"							"Duel"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_custom_legion_commander_duel_Description"				"Legion Commander and the target enemy are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.<br><br><b><font color='#ff0000'>Damage for victories has a cap of %max_damage%</font></b><font color='#53ea48'><font color='#53ea48'><br><br><b>Can be cast on creeps, granting %creeps_damage% damage for victory"

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hoodwink_acorn_shot_custom_Description"			"Fires Hoodwink's attack with an acorn at the target unit.  The acorn bounces to nearby targets, slowing them and dealing a percentage of Hoodwink's attack with bonus damage.\nIf point targeted, a tree is created at the target position and the acorn will bounce to nearby targets.  The ability may be placed on auto-cast to force this behavior."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_thirst_custom"										"Thirst"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_thirst_custom_Description"							"Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills a unit. Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below %min_bonus_pct%%%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below %invis_threshold_pct%%%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_thirst_custom_Lore"									"Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_thirst_custom_Note0"									"Not triggered by Illusions."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_thirst_custom_Note1"									"Max movement speed bonus occurs when an enemy's health is at or below %max_bonus_pct%%%."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_thirst_custom_Note2"									"Effects linger for %linger_duration% seconds if a target dies."

"Mars.Quest_4"	"Finish 1st place using main legendary talent Arena of Blood"

"Mars.Quest_8"	"Kill heroes in Arena of Blood"

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_spear_custom"								"Spear of Mars"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_spear_custom_Description"					"Mars throws his legendary Spear with deadly precision, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwark_custom_Description"					"Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides.<br><br> Can be toggled, removing Mars's ability to attack, and locking the direction he is facing. When active, reduces movement speed and re-directs %redirect_chance%%% of the attack projectiles aimed at Mars's allies towards Mars instead."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwark_custom_scepter_description"		    "Creates invulnerable soldiers around Mars' front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his attacks that have bonus damage and slow enemies. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwark_custom_Lore"						"Only the very foolish dare to fight fair with the god of war."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwark_custom_Note0"						"Redirect only works if the projectile targets are in a cone behind Mars or within 100 range of him."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwark_scepter_description"          "Active Bulwark no longer slows you<br><br>Creates %soldier_count% invulnerable soldiers on both sides of Mars front while Bulwark is toggled on. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns. The Tempest Double gives bounty gold to enemies when killed.<br><br><b>Ability cooldown starts when the duplicate dies</b><br><br><b><font color='#ff0000'>Duplicate attack damage reduced by %damage_reduce%%%<br><br>At a distance of %far_distance% from the original, the duplicate cannot attack or use abilities and items<br><br>Duplicate loses %health_loss%%% health when the original dies<br><br>Scythe of Vise and Abyssal Blade shares cooldown between the original and the duplicate</font></b>"
